column5: Sorry doomsdayers, them silly birds got their drunk on  http://www.lfpress.com/news/weird/2011/01/12/16874821.html
Tha Jack Daniels will do it every time
I guess "drinking like a bird" no longer means small amounts of consumption.

ahhh. Filling the media with false info to reduce the panic in the general population.We've all seen that before.Surprised they didnt say they were hit by weather ballons Yup............tis the end of the world

I hate when drunk birds drop dead into my hot tub, I also hate when the neighbors light fireworks and the sky rains dead birds  if the media and scientists claimed it was a strange bird virus, I'd believe it, this crap is just an insult to our intelligence

Ive heard of Birds getting drunk from fermented berries so alcohol poisoning would make sense. Partridge will get drunk from juniper berries.  If I was  good and drunk and then had to flap my arms and fly I'd drop dead before I got far too.
